E

Effect - Interface in bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects
Interface to model every effect that will be created in the game.
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.DoAction
Executes all of the effects from the world if allowed
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.DropItem
Executes the drop item effect.
execute(Player, World) - Method in interface bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.Effect
Executes the logic for whatever class it's present in.
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.GoDirection
Executes the logic to move the user from their current location to the new location in the new location is by their current location.
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.LookItem
Inspects the given item if the item exists and the player can see it otherwise a message is printed.
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.LookLocation
Tells the player information about their surroundings, what items are around them and what directions they can go in to get to new places.
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.Message
Prints the assigned message to the console
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.Quit
Throws a QuitException which eventually closes the game when caught
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.ShowInventory
Displays the contents of the players inventory or prints a message if the player has no items in their inventory.
execute(Player, World) - Method in class bcu.s17119577.adventure.effects.TakeItem
Puts the given item from the location into the player's inventory if the item is in the players location and can be picked up.
